physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#437, L. Rabbi C.E.H. Kauvar, U.S.O. - J.W.B. Conference.''

mods.abstract: U.S.O. - Jewish Welfare Board Rocky Mountain Area conference award ceremony. Rabbi C. E. Kauvar stands at left beside two unidentified men as one hands a Distinguished Service Award to Nate Mendel. An unidentified man wearing a United States Army uniform sits in front of them at a head table with Sam Frazin.

name.namePart: Kauvar, C. E. Hillel--(Charles Eliezer Hillel),--1879-1971
